name: myCred Badge Editor
author: myCred

sections.description:
myCred Badge Editor is a powerful enhancement add-on that allows you to design, edit and download professional-looking digital badge images from the plugin’s back-end dashboard.

Easy-to-use badge builder interface – The Badge Editor’s UI is user-friendly and convenient for amateurs and professionals.

Create unlimited badges – You can create hundreds of badges without hooks, gimmicks, or usage limits.

Unlimited icons and shapes – Choose from thousands of icons and shapes for your badge and customize them using a state-of-the-art toolbar.

Create Open Badge Compliant Badges
Badges created using myCred Badge Editor will be open-badge compliant thanks to integration with Open Badge. Open Badges are verifiable so that a viewer can confirm the credential’s issuer and expiration.

myCred Badge Editor Features

  • Design digital images that can be used as badges, ranks, and images for point types.
  • Real-time updates on the badge editor’s canvas board.
  • Save digital badges/images for later use.
  • Edit digital badges using the badge builder’s toolbar.
  • Download digital badges in three formats: SVG, PNG, JPG.
  • Create and customize badges using the toolbar.
  • Ready-to-use icon/shapes library.
  • Customization options include Background Color, Color Fill, Gradient Fill, Orientation, Border Width, Alignment, and Object Options.
  • Add or edit the badge’s Text, Font Style, Alignment, and Object options.
  • Freestyle draw badges using the brush option in the badge editor.
  • Upload and customize images in the badge editor.
  • Adjust the canvas’s size, height, width, aspect ratio, color fill, gradient fill, and orientation.

Technical Documentation

To read the technical documentation for myCred Badge Editor, please click here

myCred – The most powerful gamification and rewards/loyalty plugin for WordPress

myCred is an intelligent and adaptive points management system that allows you to build and manage a broad range of digital rewards, including points, ranks, and badges on your WordPress/WooCommerce-powered website.

myCred allows THREE different ways through which you can award your users:

  • Points – Set events and triggers to allow real-time tracking and automatically award your users with points.
  • Ranks – Set ranks within your leaderboards and reward your users with significant perks after they reach a certain milestone.
  • Badges – Boost your users’ participation by rewarding them for their exceptional performance.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

New – Compatible with WordPress Version 6.6.1.

1.0.1

New – Compatible with WordPress Version 6.5.2.

1.0

Initial Version
